reviews.text:
So I'll start off with my usual rant about the lack of mofos leaving reviews on stuff they mix. And maybe I can understand not leaving a review on a recipe you didn't like but that's not the case with this one.  I might have mixed it earlier if people had indicated how good it was but...  nevertheless..
This is a banger and nice change of pace by leading with the FLV Pudding.  Very smooth and its only been a week.  I think those butterscotches need a little more time to come thru and it'll be that much better.   Nice recipe.  Mix it and review it!  ***  UPDATE**  THIS SHIT IS DELICIOUS!! MY FAVORITE FURIOUSMIX TO DATE.
